summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates Qiskit's text‑based circuit visualizer, checking the ASCII/UTF‑8 rendering of a wide variety of quantum operations, control‑flow constructs, parameters, layouts, compression levels, labeling, and edge cases such as idle wires and irrational numbers.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the text circuit drawing component so that developers and end‑users can depend on accurate, readable circuit diagrams in command‑line or documentation contexts.
